item.description:
Friendly Fire Pack 9 contains eight scenarios featured in the Friendly Fire 2014 Advanced Squad Leader tournament. The scenarios are:

FrF69 To Ashes by Matthias Ronnblom
France 1940 British vs. Germans, 6 turns, 3 maps
A German force mostly composed of infantry and towed Guns had to push across open fields to rescue a small German force about to face 12 light British AFV.

FrF70 An Estonian interlude by Erik Leander
USSR 1941 Soviets vs. Estonians, 7 turns, 1 map
Small scenario in which both sides have to rush to a building, possibly taking parallel paths along the board 23 canal.

FrF71 Pulling out by Matthias Ronnblom
USSR 1942 Germans vs. Soviets, 7 turns, 2 maps including the excellemt FrFA map
To simulate confusion, two Soviet AFVs will randomly turn abandoned at the consternation of the Soviet side.

FrF72 The Mubo Decision by Andrew Rogers
New Guinea 1943 Australian vs. Japanese, 5 turns, 2 half-maps
An attack - counterattack bloodbath.

FrF73 Sledgehammers by Peter Struijf and Chris Mazzei
France 1944 Germans vs. British, 6 turns, 2 maps
Low quality infantry supported by 150mm SPAs attacking HIP British commandos.

FrF74 Out of their Element by Matthias Ronnblom
Poland 1944 Germans vs. Soviets, 6.5 turns, 2 half-maps

FrF75 Goodbye Brother by Matthias Ronnblom
Finland 1944 Finns vs. Germans , 6 turns, 2 half-maps
Includes as optional German seaborne assault against the Finns.

FrF76 Pain in the Neck by Michael Koch
Germany 1945 Soviets vs. Germans =, 6.5 turns, 2 half-maps
Retreating SS troops with two captured Shermans run into a small Soviet detachment.
